summary: Completed testing of F1 Fast Lap Challenge features: Admin Login (admin/admin), Track Image Upload, Design Editor (Background/Favicon Upload), SMTP Test Error Messages, Lap Entry with Optional Email, Event Status Email Trigger. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Admin Login with admin/admin credentials - works correctly
Track Dialog - Upload button visible and clickable
Track Dialog - File input exists for image upload
Design Editor - Hintergrund tab with background image upload button
Design Editor - Website tab with favicon upload button
Design Editor - Both upload buttons are visible and enabled
SMTP Test - Shows improved error messages when not configured
SMTP Test - Shows specific error for missing fields (Absender E-Mail nicht konfiguriert)
Lap Entry - Email toggle enables email input field
Lap Entry - Can add entry with optional email
Lap Entry - Entry added successfully with toast confirmation
Event Status - Setting to 'finished' triggers email background task
Backend API - All 18 pytest tests passed (100% success rate)
seed_data_creation: Test data cleaned up after testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working: 1) Admin login with admin/admin works, 2) Track image upload button in Strecken dialog is clickable, 3) Design Editor has working upload buttons for background image (Hintergrund tab) and favicon (Website tab), 4) SMTP test shows improved German error messages, 5) Lap entry form has optional email field with toggle, 6) Event status change to 'finished' triggers email sending background task. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_f1_features.py cover all API endpoints with 18 passing tests.

admin_login.details: Login with admin/admin credentials works correctly, redirects to dashboard

track_image_upload.details: Upload button in Strecken dialog is visible, enabled, and clickable

design_editor_background.details: Hintergrund tab has URL input and upload button for background image

design_editor_favicon.details: Website tab has URL input and upload button for favicon

smtp_test_errors.details: SMTP test shows improved German error messages: 'SMTP nicht konfiguriert', 'Absender E-Mail nicht konfiguriert'

lap_entry_email.details: Email toggle enables optional email field, entries can be added with or without email

event_email_trigger.details: Setting event status to 'finished' triggers send_results_email background task
